thread.title: All of Us Are Loving All of Chrissy Teigen and John Legend at the Oscars
thread.title_full: All of Us Are Loving All of Chrissy Teigen and John Legend at the Oscars

author: Monica Sisavat
title: All of Us Are Loving All of Chrissy Teigen and John Legend at the Oscars
text:
Chrissy Teigen and John Legend at the 2017 Oscars All of Us Are Loving All of Chrissy Teigen and John Legend at the Oscars February 26, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 All of Us Are Loving All of Chrissy Teigen and John Legend at the Oscars 
We can always count on Chrissy Teigen and John Legend to pack on the PDA , and their latest outing was no different. On Sunday, the pair stepped out at the Oscars in LA looking like an absolute dream. Not only did they play up their sweet chemistry, hugging and laughing while posing for pictures, but during their red carpet interview with Ryan Seacrest , John told Chrissy, "You look like a goddess. I'm very pleased." Consider our hearts destroyed.
